top_comments.comment: We’re only in the early years of these consoles and it seems as if their already hitting their limits…maybe a rock solid 4k60fps is still to big a challenge for this gen.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Lots of small graphical, audio and stuttering issues with this title, but I still loved playing through it.
Just finished on PS5! Really good game don't think I've ever taken so many pics in a game! Graphically stunning pros definitely outweigh the few cons I encountered.

Can you produce a video about the last gen versions as well?

I use the performance mode during battles and the quality mode for the rest of the time.
Character design is great I don’t know why some people are mad, I recently watched the movies to get some backstory before playing and the game design is far superior than the movie
We’re only 1 year in into the new generation and already games are running 4K 30fps only. There is no hinder from last gen, no nothing…. 6 more years to go with this generation….
